attributes.action: show Al Gore's film 'An Inconvenient Truth' as a simultaneous broadcast on all terrestial TV channels.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Al Gore's influential film 'An Inconvenient Truth' is now required viewing in schools in several European nations, and following the UN Paris Climate Change meeting in February 2007 the British government has announced similar plans for UK schools. A welcome and laudible initiative but why not go further? If the government is serious about global warming, and serious about changing attitudes, why not broadcast 'An Inconvenient Truth'to the nation?
